name: app/modules/todos/TodoApp.component.js
Todo
description: Generate a clickable todo item with a label and an delete button

params.name: props
params.description: react props object

params.name: props.completed
params.description: whether the todo is completed or not

params.name: props.label
params.description: the todo label

params.name: props.onClick
params.description: the function to perform when the todo label is clicked, here {@link toggleTodo}

params.name: props.onButtonClick
params.description: the function to perform when the todo button is clicked, here {@link removeTodo}

params.name: props
params.description: react props object

params.name: props.filteredTodos
params.description: pre-filtered list of todos depending on the actual selected filter

params.name: props.onTodoClick
params.description: function to perform when a todo label is clicked, here {@link toggleTodo}

params.name: props.onTodoButtonClick
params.description: function to perform when a todo button is clicked, here {@link removeTodo}

name: TodoForm
description: Generate a form to submit a new todo

params.name: props
params.description: react props object

params.name: props.onTodoFormSubmit
params.description: function to perform on form submit

name: FilterLink
description: Generate a link to change filter value

params.name: props
params.description: react props object

params.name: props.active
params.description: whether the link is already active or not

params.name: props.filter
params.description: constant representing the filter value

params.name: props.onClick
params.description: function to perform when link is clicked, here {@link setTodoFilter}

name: TodoFilterLinks
description: Generate a list of todo filter links

params.name: props
params.description: react props object

params.name: props.filterList
params.description: list of all available filters

params.name: props.currentFilter
params.description: constant representing the currently active filter in the list

params.name: props.onLinkClick
params.description: function to perform when a filter link is clicked

params.name: props.todos
